post-1.title: HackTheBox Uni CTF 2023 - One Step Closer
post-1.author: Jeremy Dunn
post-1.summary: The first forensics challenge of HackTheBox Uni CTF, called One Step Closer, challenged participants to analyze a malicious JavaScript attachment that lead to VBS, PowerShell, and .NET execution.

post-2.title: HackTheBox Uni CTF 2023 - ZombieNet
post-2.author: Jeremy Dunn
post-2.summary: The second forensics challenge for HackTheBox University CTF 2023 was called ZombieNet.  It gave participants an image of an OpenWRT router, and asked them to determine how the attackers were maintaining persistent access to the device.  This post will walk through the steps I took to solve the challenge.
